hero.title: Connect. Collaborate. Grow:
hero.subtitle: The CSO Network for West Africa
hero.description: The CSO Network for West Africa is a platform that connects and supports civil society organisations in West Africa.

feature1.title: What Our CSO Collaboration Platform Is For
feature1.subtitle: To help civil society organisations across West Africa easily connect, share resources, and build powerful cross-border partnerships that drive social impact.

findCsos.title: Find CSOs Easily
findCsos.description: discover organisations by country, sector, and area of impact, all in one simple search.

shareResources.title: Share & Discover Resources
shareResources.description: Post your latest news, grants, events, and partnership calls, while discovering opportunities from other CSOs.

connectBorders.title: Connect Across Borders
connectBorders.description: Break geographic barriers and build lasting partnerships that drive real impact across Nigeria, Benin, and Gambia.

feature2.title: Connecting CSO Across Nigeria, Benin, and The Gambia

feature3.title: Featured organizations
feature3.subtitle: Discover impactful CSOs making a difference across Nigeria, Benin, and The Gambia.

cta.title: Start connecting with CSO across West Africa
cta.description: Discover the latest organizations, get personalized recommendations, and access all the tools you need to build meaningful partnerships across West Africa.

footer.description: Onboard your organization and start exploring opportunities with civil society organizations near you and beyond.

login.title: Login
login.description: Enter your email below to login to your account

signUp.title: Sign up
signUp.description: Create a new account. Join a Community of Change Makers

forgotPassword.title: Reset Your Password
forgotPassword.description: Type in your email and we'll send you a link to reset your password

success.title: Check Your Email
success.message: If you registered using your email and password, you will receive a password reset email.

updatePassword.title: Reset Your Password
updatePassword.description: Please enter your new password below.

page.title: Discover Organisations
page.description: Find and connect with civil society organisations working across Nigeria, Benin, and Gambia

noResults.description: Try adjusting your search criteria or filters to find more organisations.
